skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end is the visual part of websites or apps that users interact with directly. It involves HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a user-friendly experience.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Backend powers the server-side of websites, managing data and executing business logic with languages like Python , Node.js or Express.js .

skills.title: MERN Stack
skills.description: MERN stack is a full-stack JavaScript framework, combining MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. It enables end-to-end development.

skills.title: Webflow
skills.description: a web design and development platform that allows users to design, build, and launch responsive websites visually without writing any code.

portfolio.title: ARE : Arya Real Estate
portfolio.description: Designed and developed a real estate website using HTML, CSS, and the Bootstrap framework. This project showcases my skills in creating responsive and visually appealing web applications. Discover your dream property effortlessly!

portfolio.title: Personal-Portfolio
portfolio.description: Hey there! I'm Arya, and this is my digital playground. Explore who I am and what I do. From my skills to standout projects, it's all here. Let's chat—whether you've got a project in mind or just want to say hi, head over to the 'Contact Me' section. Excited to connect!
